org.keyboardplaying.mapper.parser

Class BaseTemporalParser<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.keyboardplaying.mapper.parser.BaseTemporalParser<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of time objects this SimpleParser converts from and to
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimpleParser<T>, TemporalParser<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CalendarParser, DateParser

    public abstract class BaseTemporalParser<T>
extends Object
implements TemporalParser<T>
    This implementation of SimpleParser provides some utility methods when parsing time representations.

    Using this implies to use Date objects at least as intermediary steps. You might wish to use more direct ways if it is possible.

    Author:
    Cyrille Chopelet (http://keyboardplaying.org)

      • convertStringToDate

        protected Date convertStringToDate(String value)
                            throws ParsingException
        Converts a String representation of a date to a Date instance.

        The String is expected to conform to the format specified for this BaseTemporalParser.

        Parameters:
        value - the String representation of a date
        Returns:
        a Date instance
        Throws:
        ParsingException - if the supplied String could not be parsed

      • convertDateToString

        protected String convertDateToString(Date value)
        Converts a Date instance to a String representation.

        The String will conform to the format specified for this BaseTemporalParser.

        Parameters:
        value - the Date
        Returns:
        a String representation of the supplied date
        Throws:
        ParsingException - if the supplied String could not be parsed
